director.name: 米丽娅姆·布利泽 Miriam Bliese

introduction: Miriam Bliese / Germany / 2008 / 18 minsJudith and Kroner view flats. The flats do all look the same, they have high ceilings and white walls. Judith is 26 years old and works as a real estate agent. She loves the lover of her mother. Things like these happen. judith, her mother and Kroner know about each other, all suffer, no one says anything. And when the situation finally collapses all pretend to not have noticed anything.
